verses.arabic: قَدْ سَمِعَ اللَّهُ قَوْلَ الَّتِي تُجَادِلُكَ فِي زَوْجِهَا وَتَشْتَكِي إِلَى اللَّهِ وَاللَّهُ يَسْمَعُ تَحَاوُرَكُمَا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ بَصِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Qad sami'a allahu qawla allati tujadiluka fi zawjiha wa tashtaki ila allahi wa allahu yasma'u tahawurakuma inna allaha sami'un basir
verses.translation: Allah has certainly heard the speech of the one who argues with you, [O Muhammad], concerning her husband and directs her complaint to Allah. And Allah hears your dialogue; indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing

verses.arabic: الَّذِينَ يُظَاهِرُونَ مِنكُم مِّن نِّسَائِهِم مَّا هُنَّ أُمَّهَاتِهِم ۖ إِنْ أُمَّهَاتُهُمْ إِلَّا اللَّائِي وَلَدْنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَيَقُولُونَ مُنكَرًا مِّنَ الْقَوْلِ وَزُورًا ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٌ
verses.transliteration: Alladhina yuzahiruna minkum min nisa'ihim ma hunna ummahatihim in ummahatuhum illa al-la'i waladnahum wa innahum la-yaquluna munkaran min al-qawli wa zuran wa inna allaha la-'afuwwun ghafur
verses.translation: Those who pronounce thihar among you [to separate] from their wives - they are not [consequently] their mothers. Their mothers are none but those who gave birth to them. And indeed, they are saying an objectionable statement and a falsehood. But indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving

verses.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ يُظَاهِرُونَ مِن نِّسَائِهِمْ ثُمَّ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا قَالُوا فَتَحْرِيرُ رَقَبَةٍ مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَتَمَاسَّا ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ تُوعَظُونَ بِهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa alladhina yuzahiruna min nisa'ihim thumma ya'uduna lima qalu fa-tahriru raqabatin min qabli an yatamassa dhalikum tu'adhun bih wa allahu bima ta'maluna khabir
verses.translation: And those who pronounce thihar from their wives and then [wish to] go back on what they said - then [there must be] the freeing of a slave before they touch one another. That is what you are admonished thereby; and Allah is Acquainted with what you do

verses.arabic: فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ شَهْرَيْنِ مُتَتَابِعَيْنِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَتَمَاسَّا ۖ فَمَن لَّمْ يَسْتَطِعْ فَإِطْعَامُ سِتِّينَ مِسْكِينًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِتُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ۚ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ ۗ وَلِلْكَافِرِينَ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Fa-man lam yajid fa-siyamu shahrayni mutatabi'ayn min qabli an yatamassa fa-man lam yastati' fa-it'amu sittina miskinan dhalika li-tu'minu billahi wa rasulih wa tilka hududu allahi wa li-al-kafirina 'adhabun alim
verses.translation: And he who does not find [a slave] - then a fast for two months consecutively before they touch one another; and he who is unable - then the feeding of sixty poor persons. That is for you to believe [completely] in Allah and His Messenger; and those are the limits [set by] Allah. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُحَادُّونَ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ كُبِتُوا كَمَا كُبِتَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ وَأَنزَلْنَا آيَاتٍ بَيِّنَاتٍ ۚ وَلِلْكَافِرِينَ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ
verses.transliteration: Inna alladhina yuhadduna allaha wa rasulahu kubitu kama kubita alladhina min qablihim wa anzanna ayatin bayyinatin wa li-al-kafirina 'adhabun muhin
verses.translation: Indeed, those who oppose Allah and His Messenger are abased as those before them were abased. And We have certainly sent down verses of clear evidence. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَبْعَثُهُمُ اللَّهُ جَمِيعًا فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا ۚ أَحْصَاهُ اللَّهُ وَنَسُوهُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.transliteration: Yawma yab'athuhumu allahu jami'an fa-yunabbi'uhum bima 'amilu ahsahu allahu wa nasuhu wa allahu 'ala kulli shay'in shahid
verses.translation: On the Day when Allah will resurrect them all and inform them of what they did. Allah had enumerated it, while they forgot it; and Allah is, over all things, Witness

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۖ مَا يَكُونُ مِن نَّجْوَىٰ ثَلَاثَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ رَابِعُهُمْ وَلَا خَمْسَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ سَادِسُهُمْ وَلَا أَدْنَىٰ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَا أَكْثَرَ إِلَّا هُوَ مَعَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كَانُوا ۚ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Alam tara anna allaha ya'lamu ma fi as-samawati wa ma fi al-ardi ma yakunu min najwa thalathatin illa huwa rabi'uhum wa la khamsatin illa huwa sadisuhum wa la adna min dhalika wa la akthara illa huwa ma'ahum ayna ma kanu thumma yunabbi'uhum bima 'amilu yawma al-qiyamati inna allaha bi-kulli shay'in 'alim
verses.translation: Have you not considered that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth? There is no private conversation of three but that He is the fourth of them, nor are there five but that He is the sixth of them - and no less than that and no more except that He is with them [in knowledge] wherever they are. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed, Allah is, of all things, Knowing

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى الَّذِينَ نُهُوا عَنِ النَّجْوَىٰ ثُمَّ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا نُهُوا عَنْهُ وَيَتَنَاجَوْنَ بِالْإِثْمِ وَالْعُدْوَانِ وَمَعْصِيَتِ الرَّسُولِ وَإِذَا جَاءُوكَ حَيَّوْكَ بِمَا لَمْ يُحَيِّكَ بِهِ اللَّهُ وَيَقُولُونَ فِي أَنفُسِهِمْ لَوْلَا يُعَذِّبُنَا اللَّهُ بِمَا نَقُولُ ۚ حَسْبُهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ يَصْلَوْنَهَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.transliteration: Alam tara ila alladhina nuhu 'an an-najwa thumma ya'uduna lima nuhu 'anhu wa yatanajawna bi-al-ithmi wa al-'udwani wa ma'siyati ar-rasuli wa idha ja'uka hayyawka bima lam yuhayyika bih allahu wa yaquluna fi anfusihim lawla yu'adhibuna allahu bima naqul hasbuhum jahannamu yaslawnaha fa-bi'sa al-masir
verses.translation: Have you not considered those who were forbidden from private conversation, then they return to that which they were forbidden and converse among themselves about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you with that [word] by which Allah does not greet you and say among themselves, "Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?" Sufficient for them is Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the destination

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَنَاجَيْتُمْ فَلَا تَتَنَاجَوْا بِالْإِثْمِ وَالْعُدْوَانِ وَمَعْصِيَتِ الرَّسُولِ وَتَنَاجَوْا بِالْبِرِّ وَالتَّقْوَىٰ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ الَّذِي إِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu idha tanajaytum fala tatanajaw bi-al-ithmi wa al-'udwani wa ma'siyati ar-rasuli wa tanajaw bi-al-birri wa at-taqwa wa ittaqu allaha alladhi ilayhi tuhsharun
verses.translation: O you who have believed, when you converse privately, do not converse about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger but converse about righteousness and piety. And fear Allah, to whom you will be gathered

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا النَّجْوَىٰ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ لِيَحْزُنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَلَيْسَ بِضَارِّهِمْ شَيْئًا إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.transliteration: Innama an-najwa mina ash-shaytani li-yahzuna alladhina amanu wa laysa bi-darrihim shay'an illa bi-idhni allahi wa 'ala allahi fa-liyatawakkali al-mu'minun
verses.translation: Private conversation is only from Satan that he may grieve those who have believed, but he will not harm them at all except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمْ تَفَسَّحُوا فِي الْمَجَالِسِ فَافْسَحُوا يَفْسَحِ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا قِيلَ انشُزُوا فَانشُزُوا يَرْفَعِ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنكُمْ وَالَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْعِلْمَ دَرَجَاتٍ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu idha qila lakum tafassahu fi al-majalisi fa-afsahu yafsahi allahu lakum wa idha qila unshuzu fa-unshuzu yarfa'i allahu alladhina amanu minkum wa alladhina utu al-'ilma darajat wa allahu bima ta'maluna khabir
verses.translation: O you who have believed, when you are told, "Space yourselves" in assemblies, then make space; Allah will make space for you. And when you are told, "Arise," then arise; Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا نَاجَيْتُمُ الرَّسُولَ فَقَدِّمُوا بَيْنَ يَدَيْ نَجْوَاكُمْ صَدَقَةً ۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ وَأَطْهَرُ ۚ فَإِن لَّمْ تَجِدُوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu idha najaytumu ar-rasula fa-qaddimu bayna yaday najwakum sadaqatan dhalika khayrun lakum wa atharu fa-in lam tajidu fa-inna allaha ghafurun rahim
verses.translation: O you who have believed, when you [wish to] privately consult the Messenger, present before your consultation a charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you find not [the means] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

verses.arabic: أَشْفَقْتُمْ أَن تُقَدِّمُوا بَيْنَ يَدَيْ نَجْوَاكُمْ صَدَقَاتٍ ۚ فَإِذَا لَمْ تَفْعَلُوا وَتَابَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْكُمْ فَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ خَبِيرٌ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Ashfaqtum an tuqaddimu bayna yaday najwakum sadaqatin fa-idha lam taf'alu wa taba allahu 'alaykum fa-aqimu as-salata wa atu az-zakata wa ati'u allaha wa rasulahu wa allahu khabirun bima ta'malun
verses.translation: Have you feared to present before your consultation charities? Then when you do not and Allah has forgiven you, then [continue to] establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى الَّذِينَ تَوَلَّوْا قَوْمًا غَضِبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مَّا هُم مِّنكُمْ وَلَا مِنْهُمْ وَيَحْلِفُونَ عَلَى الْكَذِبِ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Alam tara ila alladhina tawallaw qawman ghadiba allahu 'alayhim ma hum minkum wa la minhum wa yahlifuna 'ala al-kadhibi wa hum ya'lamun
verses.translation: Have you not considered those who make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry? They are neither of you nor of them, and they swear to untruth while they know [they are lying]

verses.arabic: أَعَدَّ اللَّهُ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ سَاءَ مَا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: A'adda allahu lahum 'adhaban shadidan innahum sa'a ma kanu ya'malun
verses.translation: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing

verses.arabic: اتَّخَذُوا أَيْمَانَهُمْ جُنَّةً فَصَدُّوا عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ
verses.transliteration: Ittakhadhu aymanahum junnatan fa-saddu 'an sabili allahi fa-lahum 'adhabun muhin
verses.translation: They took their [false] oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah, and for them is a humiliating punishment

verses.arabic: لَّن تُغْنِيَ عَنْهُمْ أَمْوَالُهُمْ وَلَا أَوْلَادُهُم مِّنَ اللَّهِ شَيْئًا ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ
verses.transliteration: Lan tughniya 'anhum amwaluhum wa la awladuhum mina allahi shay'an ula'ika ashabu an-nari hum fiha khalidun
verses.translation: Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَبْعَثُهُمُ اللَّهُ جَمِيعًا فَيَحْلِفُونَ لَهُ كَمَا يَحْلِفُونَ لَكُمْ وَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمْ عَلَىٰ شَيْءٍ ۚ أَلَا إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ الْكَاذِبُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yawma yab'athuhumu allahu jami'an fa-yahlifuna lahu kama yahlifuna lakum wa yahsabuna annahum 'ala shay'in ala innahum humu al-kadhibun
verses.translation: On the Day Allah will resurrect them all, and they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they are [standing] on something. Unquestionably, it is they who are the liars

verses.arabic: اسْتَحْوَذَ عَلَيْهِمُ الشَّيْطَانُ فَأَنسَاهُمْ ذِكْرَ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ حِزْبُ الشَّيْطَانِ ۚ أَلَا إِنَّ حِزْبَ الشَّيْطَانِ هُمُ الْخَاسِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Istahwadha 'alayhimu ash-shaytanu fa-ansahum dhikra allahi ula'ika hizbu ash-shaytani ala inna hizba ash-shaytani humu al-khasirun
verses.translation: Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of Allah. Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan - they will be the losers

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُحَادُّونَ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ أُولَٰئِكَ فِي الْأَذَلِّينَ
verses.transliteration: Inna alladhina yuhadduna allaha wa rasulahu ula'ika fi al-adhallin
verses.translation: Indeed, the ones who oppose Allah and His Messenger - those will be among the most humbled

verses.arabic: كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَأَغْلِبَنَّ أَنَا وَرُسُلِي ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ
verses.transliteration: Kataba allahu la-aghlibanna ana wa rusuli inna allaha qawiyyun 'aziz
verses.translation: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might

verses.arabic: لَّا تَجِدُ قَوْمًا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ يُوَادُّونَ مَن حَادَّ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ وَلَوْ كَانُوا آبَاءَهُمْ أَوْ أَبْنَاءَهُمْ أَوْ إِخْوَانَهُمْ أَوْ عَشِيرَتَهُمْ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ كَتَبَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ الْإِيمَانَ وَأَيَّدَهُم بِرُوحٍ مِّنْهُ ۖ وَيُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ حِزْبُ اللَّهِ ۚ أَلَا إِنَّ حِزْبَ اللَّهِ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.transliteration: La tajidu qawman yu'minuna billahi wa al-yawmi al-akhiri yuwadduna man hadda allaha wa rasulahu wa law kanu aba'ahum aw abna'ahum aw ikhwanahum aw 'ashiratahum ula'ika kataba fi qulubihimu al-imana wa ayyadahum bi-ruhin minh wa yudkhiluhum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidin fiha radiya allahu 'anhum wa radu 'anhu ula'ika hizbu allahi ala inna hizba allahi humu al-muflihun
verses.translation: You will not find a people who believe in Allah and the Last Day having affection for those who oppose Allah and His Messenger, even if they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their kindred. Those - He has decreed within their hearts faith and supported them with spirit from Him. And We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah. Unquestionably, the party of Allah - they are the successful
